message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a unique opportunity to get your hands on something truly special. I'm willing to sell it to you for $20000. I think it's a fair price considering its value and rarity.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $18000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that the product is worth more than $18000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $19500. I think this is a fair compromise that still reflects the product's value.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $18500, but no higher. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my means.

I understand your budget constraints, Bob, and I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $19000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the product's value and rarity. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'm willing to make a deal.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm really trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $18500, but I'm not sure I can go any higher. Can you think about meeting me at this price?
